attributes.action: Tory party to stand down,vote of no confidence in D Cameron, G Osborne and IDS
attributes.background: The Tory party have lied and cheated their way into power. This is a petition to try and remove them before they destroy this country for the honest hard working people.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106407

We also have a petition asking for a vote of no confidence in the PrimeMinister: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471

There are also petitions calling for a vote of no confidence in Iain Duncan Smith: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104436 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106803

You could also sign a petition asking fort a vote of no confidence in George Osborne:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105353
